content.en: Hyperspectral image classification: Researchers are exploring various ways to improve the classification of hyperspectral images, which can have applications in fields like remote sensing and medical imaging. They are investigating the use of active learning, transfer learning, deep learning, and few-shot learning algorithms to address challenges such as limited labeled data and small sample sizes. These algorithms, such as active transfer learning networks and convolutional transformer-based few-shot learning, aim to enhance the accuracy and efficiency of hyperspectral image classification.
content.da: Hyperspektral billedklassifikation: Forskere udforsker forskellige metoder til at forbedre klassifikationen af hyperspektrale billeder, som kan have anvendelser inden for områder som fjernmåling og medicinsk billeddannelse. De undersøger brugen af aktiv læring, transfer learning, dyb læring og få-skud læringsalgoritmer for at tackle udfordringer som begrænset mærket data og små prøve størrelser. Disse algoritmer, såsom aktive transfer læringsnetværk og konvolutionel transformer-baseret få-skud læring, sigter mod at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af hyperspektral billedklassifikation.
